blocks.name: note-alert
blocks.markdown:
> [!NOTE]
> Useful information that users should know, even when skimming content.

blocks.name: tip-alert
blocks.markdown:
> [!TIP]
> Helpful advice for doing things better or more easily.

blocks.name: important-alert
blocks.markdown:
> [!IMPORTANT]
> Key information users need to know to achieve their goal.

blocks.name: warning-alert
blocks.markdown:
> [!WARNING]
> Urgent info that needs immediate user attention to avoid problems.

blocks.name: caution-alert
blocks.markdown:
> [!CAUTION]
> Advises about risks or negative outcomes of certain actions.

blocks.name: star-us-alert
blocks.description: Alert to encourage the user star the repo
blocks.markdown:
> [!IMPORTANT]
> Star Us ⭐️ to instantly receive the latest updates from GitHub ⚡
